original_title: Statement from Bed, Bath & Beyond CEO Marcus Lemonis on why they will not open or operate in California   — The Donald
article_summary: Bed Bath & Beyond will not open stores in California, citing unspecified reasons, while some commenters criticize the CEO and express disapproval over the company's decision to stop selling MyPillow products. The company is currently undergoing rebranding under Overstock.com.</s>
